content: blend the timeless allure of granny squares with a fresh contemporary aesthetic as you traverse sections of simple granny stripes each square offers a nod to nostalgic craftsmanship the playful tassels add a whimsical touch sections of crochet granny stitch row help the squares stand out and reduce the ends to weave in in this granny scarf crochet pattern you ll practice double crocheting making granny squares seaming and working in the granny stitch a detailed photo tutorial guides you through each step granny scarf pattern requires worsted weight category 4 yarn such as lion brand wool-ease downloading - this listing is for the perennial granny square crochet pattern pdf only pattern pdf will be available for instant download upon payment copyright/making finished items - thank you for sharing my patterns and tutorials when you do it helps support the blog and my ability to create more patterns which by the way i seriously love to do so really i mean it thank you you may make items to sell with this pattern/tutorial in exchange i ask that you link back to makeanddocrew com do not use my photos as your own sales photos do not distribute my patterns/templates as your own permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing of any kind return policy - as this is a digital product i do not offer returns find more of our favorite crochet granny square patterns here https //makeanddocrew com/granny-square-projects/
